articles.title: The Pixel Watch exceeded expectations — now it needs to be as good as Samsung - The Verge
articles.description: Despite its flaws, the Pixel Watch sold well for a debut smartwatch. After an iterative year for smartwatch launches, Google has the opportunity to make big strides with the Pixel Watch 2. But will it?
